text: Bɨ anɨb ak takaw ogɨnap sek agɨl agak, Pen ensel ne Epesus binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok kɨlop kod mɨdep ak,2.1 God ensel agyokek amɨl, binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok kɨlop keke kod yelak. Jon takaw agak anɨb ak, ne ensel nokom nokom kɨlop agñak. Pen takaw anɨb ak, binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok mɨdupsek nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨnɨgel agɨl gos nɨgak. Sapta 2 ayɨp 3 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨmɨb. takaw agɨnɨgebin ak ensel ak nop kɨl tɨkɨnɨmɨn agak. Bɨ gap anep kugul ak ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd ne adek ak dɨ mɨdɨlɨg, lam gol dɨl gɨlak anep kugul nab okok ajup ak, takaw nɨm ak agyokeb agak.
